__TOC__

* Test timestamp in metadata file
* on the device apt-get install exiv2
* take a picture with the camera-app
* cd ~/Pictures/com.ubuntu.camera
* exiv2 <filename>.jpg
* verify that the "Timestamp" field matches the local time on the phone, not UTC time

* Test some apps
* test Tagger, scan a QR code
* Test uTorch, is the flashlight working?
